description: Rajapaksha Mudiyanselage Pushpakumara and others Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Rajapaksha Mudiyanselage Pushpakumara and others Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Burden of proof in a plea of alibi – Considering pleas of alibi in a holistic manner taking into account the entirety of the prosecution’s case – Prosecution’s responsibility in establishing its case beyond a reasonable doubt
